Description:
Property Sales Advisor is responsible for communicating the benefits of a company’s services in order to drive sales. Property Sales Advisor serves as the point of contact between the business and its prospects or clients and have a range of responsibilities including identifying prospective customers while supporting existing clients with information and assistance that relates to services.Present, promote and sell services using solid arguments to existing and prospective customers.
Perform cost-benefit and needs analysis of existing/potential customers to meet their needs.
Establish, develop, and maintain positive business and customer relationships.
Reach out to customer leads through cold calling.
Achieve agreed-upon sales targets and outcomes within the schedule.
Coordinate sales efforts with team members and other departments.
Analyze the territory/market’s potential, and track sales, and status reports.
Supply management with reports on customer needs, problems, interests, competitive activities, and potential for new products and services.
Keep abreast of best practices and promotional trends.
Continuously improve through feedback.Skills
Skills:
Proven experience as a Property Sales Advisor or similar position
Outstanding selling communication and negotiation abilities
Prioritizing, time management, and organizational skills
Ability to create and deliver presentations tailored to the audience's needs
Relationship management skills and openness to feedback
Highly motivated and target driven with a proven track record in sales
A results-oriented approach
Ability to work under pressure
Proficient in English, Arabic.
Russian speakers will be a privilege.
Working knowledge of MS Office.
